Posts.EditableText: Was enjoying using quest to create my masterpiece when suddenly I find I can't type 'e' I have to type 'go e' I can't type 'ne' I have to type 'go ne'. How do I get rid of the 'go' requirement? why is it suddenly there? This means the compass also doesn't work because the compass uses the abreviations. Hope this is an easy fix for someone in the know.

Posts.EditableText:
You've added a verb with the following pattern:

[code:2xygfxro]
kick; boot; #object#
[/code:2xygfxro]

I don't know how or why the #object# is there - but if you remove it you'll fix the problem.
Posts.HTML:
You've added a verb with the following pattern:


kick; boot; #object#


I don't know how or why the #object# is there - but if you remove it you'll fix the problem.
